notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: R.K.B., A.H., S.D.M., and G.D.K. synthesized the data; R.K.B., A.H., S.D.M., and S.C.C. analyzed the data; R.K.B. fit the statistical models with assistance from J.L. and D.A.T.C.; L.M.R. performed the simulations, L.M.R. and R.K.B. analyzed the simulation results; R.K.B., A.H., D.P.R., I.R.-B., L.M.R., J.L., and D.A.T.C. interpreted the results; R.K.B., A.H., and D.A.T.C. wrote the original draft; L.C.K., D.P.R, I.R.-B., L.M.R., J.L., and D.A.T.C. contributed written feedback. All authors wrote the manuscript.
